context_bundle.summary: Waklert vs Artvigil comparison - same 150mg armodafinil compound, different subjective effects due to excipients, dissolution rates, and manufacturing quality. Sun Pharma Waklert hits faster/harder, HAB Pharma Artvigil smoother/gradual onset.

onboarding.quick_start: Waklert 150mg (Sun Pharma) = faster onset ~2hr, sharper peak, preferred for focus. Artvigil 150mg (HAB Pharma) = slower onset ~3hr, smoother curve, better for stimulant-sensitive users.
common_patterns: Waklert hits harder due to faster GI absorption
Excipients/binders affect dissolution rate not molecule
CYP3A4 enzymes metabolize - buffer overload = stronger effect
No bioequivalence required in India = formulation variance
known_errors: Same compound different effects is NOT placebo - pharmacokinetics differ
India generics skip bioequivalence studies required in US
Sun Pharma longer track record than HAB
